title: Side Effects of Covid-19 on the Black Community (with Joy Reid)
description:
This week Joy-Anne Reid, journalist and host of AM Joy, let’s us in on the unspoken conversations around how Corona is indiscriminately impacting Black America.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
